equipment_slot.description: Determines which equipment slot to check for the item. Accepts `"mainhand"`, `"offhand"`, `"head"`, `"chest"`, `"legs"`, `"feet"`.
equipment_slot.markdownDescription: Determines which equipment slot to check for the item. Accepts `"mainhand"`, `"offhand"`, `"head"`, `"chest"`, `"legs"`, `"feet"`.

item_condition.description: The item condition type to check for on the item in the specified equipment slot.
item_condition.markdownDescription: The item condition type to check for on the item in the specified equipment slot.

type.description:
## Equipped Item

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/equipped_item)

Checks whether the entity has an item equipped in the specified equipment slot that fulfills the specified [Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/equipped_item).

Type ID: `origins:equipped_item`

---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:equipped_item",
    "equipment_slot": "mainhand",
    "item_condition": {
        "type": "origins:harvest_level",
        "comparison": ">=",
        "compare_to": 2
    }
}
```

This example will check if the item in the entity's mainhand has a harvest level of 2 or more.

title: Equipped Item (Entity Condition Type) date: 2021-04-04

Equipped Item

Entity Condition Type

Checks whether the entity has an item equipped in the specified equipment slot that fulfills the specified Item Condition Type.

Type ID: origins:equipped_item

Fields

Field Type Default Description
equipment_slot String Determines which equipment slot to check for the item. Accepts "mainhand", "offhand", "head", "chest", "legs", "feet".
item_condition Item Condition Type The item condition type to check for on the item in the specified equipment slot.

Examples

"condition": {
    "type": "origins:equipped_item",
    "equipment_slot": "mainhand",
    "item_condition": {
        "type": "origins:harvest_level",
        "comparison": ">=",
        "compare_to": 2
    }
}

This example will check if the item in the entity's mainhand has a harvest level of 2 or more.
